comment: If you can get it on sale, there isn't a better Canadian whiskey for the money. Spicy, bold, fruity, and oak. My favourite.
On sale for $35 Canadian. This is a bargain for a very nice Whisky.  Light fruit on the nose, and a surprisingly long finish with a hint of spice. Easy drinking and a great value.
My new favorite.  Nice smooth flavor with lots of spice.
very watery taste. smells like rubbing alcohol
